description.p: This package contains URDF Files for WAM robot arm. Arranged in the following directories: xacro This directory contains 3 xacro files. trasmission.urdf.xacro This file contains all description of transmission wam.urdf.xacroThis file contains all description of the wam wam_sim.urdf.xacroThis file contains all description of the wam for use in the Gazebo mesh This directory contains all STL files (use mesh tag in urdf) urdf This directory contains all URDF files building from XACRO file(in xacro directory) wam.urdf This file comes from wam.urdf.xacro wam_sim.urdf This file comes from wam_sim.urdf.xacro
